intro:
The project "JALECOlle Famicom Ver." continues to release Jaleco's Famicom titles one after another!
The 4th release is "Saiyuuki World"!
description:
★ Defeat the Ox Demon King and bring peace back to Chang'an!
An action RPG featuring a grand adventure that begins after the epilogue of Saiyuuki.
Now with in-game English translations!
Enjoy the entire "Saiyuuki World," originally released in Japan, fully in English.

【Game Story】
Son Wukong returns from Tianzhu, and peace has come to Chang'an.
However, the Demon Bull King, who was thought to have been defeated, reappears and steals the monk Sanzang and the sacred scriptures.
Under the command of Shakyamuni Buddha, Wukong rises once again. As you gather powerful weapons and items, defeat the yokai scattered across the land of Tang.
There are also puzzle-solving elements that require a bit of brainpower. Rely on the help of former companions and the hints you receive from the people you assist during your journey, as you head for the Demon Bull King's residence at Banana Leaf Cave.

 -Saiyuuki World ＜New Features＞ -
Visualize the hints you’ve gathered during your adventure, as well as the information you want to check in-game! Your adventure will become even more fulfilling and enjoyable.
★ World Information
Allows you to see which world you are currently in.
★ Gold
Check your funds anytime, whether on the road or at a shop.
★ Trade Items
Displays the items you currently hold for trading.
★ Boss Information
Shows the boss's name and health.
★ Weapon Status
The power of each weapon is visualized, The power of each weapon and armor is visualized, allowing you to check Goku's strength at any time.
★ Power-Up Items
The remaining uses or time for power-up items are visualized, allowing you to know how much longer you can use them.
★ Magic Items
The quantity, order, and the items you're holding are visualized. You can also see which magic will be used next when one runs out.
★ Life Timer
An internal timer is now visualized. When it reaches zero, *you will lose one Life Heart.
★ Life Extend
You can view your current score and the points needed to earn a "Life Heart" (up to 5 times).
★ Hint Archive
●Prophecy of the Disciple
You can always check the message from the disciple you helped.
● Informant
You can check the details of purchased amulets and talismans from the menu.

JALECOlle Common <New Features>
★Beginner-friendly rescue features
Now includes "Rewind" to quickly undo mistakes and "Quick Save & Load" to save and resume the game at any time.
★Convenient Subtitle Guide
You can see detailed effects of weapons and items when purchasing at the shop. Now, no more hesitation!?
◎ Additional helpful messages for your adventure are also available.
★Record your best time
Now includes a "Simple Timer" to record the time from the beginning of the adventure to the defeat of the final boss. 
You can aim for your best time while using Quick Save. Take on the challenge seriously without any rescue features. 
Record your best time!
★Packed with many more enjoyable features and options!
- Now includes new achievements to challenge various in-game objectives.
- Explore the gallery page to view package designs, manuals, flyers and more from the original releases.
- Screen edge options to reduce screen distortion.
- Screen Filter option.
- Wallpaper options.
- Upon completing the main game, you'll unlock a special bonus feature as a reward.
